meta.job_title: Scrum Master with Contact Center IVR Experience

skills.skill: Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent agile certifications

duties_responsibilities.duty: Successfully delivering projects in a contact center environment.
Tailoring and applying agile methodologies effectively to contact center operations.
Translating customer needs and contact center requirements into actionable tasks for the development team.
Bridging the gap between development teams and business stakeholders.
Delivering projects involving Contact Center IVR systems.
Tailoring and applying agile methodologies effectively in IVR development contexts.
Managing IVR processes, best practices, and customer interaction principles.

education_certification.credential: Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent agile certifications
